name: Undead Battler
description:
In order to progress through the game, you will need to gain level ups. Each time you level up, you unlock more stuff.

  • Level 1: 1 Minion Battle, Basic Shop
  • Level 2: +1 Minion Battle
  • Level 3: +1 Minion Battle, +1 Boss Battle
  • Level 5: +1 Boss Battle
  • Level 6: +1 Minion Battle
  • Level 7: +1 Minion Battle, Secret Shop
  • Level 8: +1 Boss Battle
  • Level 9: +1 Minion Battle
  • Level 10: +1 Grand Boss Battle
